00018 
00019 class Service;

00028 class LocalVariableListener : public VariableAttributeListener
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     // Virtual destructor always
00032     virtual ~LocalVariableListener();
00033 
00042     virtual void VariableChanged(Service& ServiceRef, const SimpleString VarName, const SimpleString NewValue) = 0;
00043 
00052     virtual bool IsValid(Service& ServiceRef, const SimpleString VarName, const SimpleString NewValue) = 0;
00053 
00054 private:

00056     bool IsValid( VariableAttribute * ChangedVariable, SimpleString newValue );
00057 };
